description_html: The first closed casework piece in the Tom Kundig Collection, the Jack Box Cabinet features an interior shelf and four brake formed steel hinging doors. Handles and hinges are machined from solid cold-rolled steel, with bronze pins and bearings providing a subtle material contrast. Available in freestanding and wall-mounted versions, the Jack Box can function either as a sideboard or a media console piece.
product_name: Jack Box - The Tom Kundig Collection
